Class OIDCImpl

  • java.lang.Object

    IOIDC

     class OIDCImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOIDC
    An implementation of IOIDC.

    • Method Detail

      • startAuthentication

        public void startAuthentication(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResult,
                       java.lang.String redirectURI,
                       java.lang.String state,
                       java.lang.String nonce,
                       java.lang.String scope,
                       java.lang.Integer maxAge,
                       java.lang.String acrValues,
                       java.lang.String encryptedMSISDN,
                       AuthenticationOptions specifiedOptions,
                       IStartAuthenticationCallback callback)
                         throws OIDCException,
                                DiscoveryResponseExpiredException
        See IOIDC.startAuthentication(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, String, String, Integer, String, String, AuthenticationOptions, IStartAuthenticationCallback).
        Specified by:
        startAuthentication in interface IOIDC
        Parameters:
        discoveryResult - Result from discovery which contains the endpoints and application credentials. (Required).
        redirectURI - On completion or error where the result information is sent using a HTTP 302 redirect. (Required).
        state - Application specified unique scope value.
        nonce - Application specified nonce value. (Required).
        scope - Requested scope. (Optional). If omitted or empty defaults to the value "openid".
        maxAge - Requested maximum time in seconds since last user authentication. (Optional). If omitted or empty defaults to the value 3600.
        acrValues - Requested Authentication Context class Reference (Optional). If omitted or empty defaults to the value "2" .
        encryptedMSISDN - Encrypted MSISDN for user if returned from discovery service. (Optional).
        specifiedOptions - Optional parameters. (Optional).
        callback - Used to capture the response. (Required).
        Throws:
        OIDCException
        DiscoveryResponseExpiredException - Thrown if the discovery response has expired.

      • parseAuthenticationResponse

        public void parseAuthenticationResponse(java.lang.String redirectURL,
                               IParseAuthenticationResponseCallback callback)
                                 throws OIDCException
        See IOIDC.parseAuthenticationResponse(String, IParseAuthenticationResponseCallback)
        Specified by:
        parseAuthenticationResponse in interface IOIDC
        Parameters:
        redirectURL - The URL which has been subject to redirection from the discovery service. (Required).
        callback - Used to capture the response. (Required).
        Throws:
        OIDCException

      • requestToken

        public void requestToken(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResult,
                java.lang.String redirectURI,
                java.lang.String code,
                TokenOptions specifiedOptions,
                IRequestTokenCallback callback)
                  throws OIDCException,
                         DiscoveryResponseExpiredException
        See IOIDC.requestToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, String, TokenOptions, IRequestTokenCallback)
        Specified by:
        requestToken in interface IOIDC
        Parameters:
        discoveryResult - Result from discovery which contains the endpoints and application credentials. (Required).
        redirectURI - Confirms the redirectURI that the application used when the authorization request. (Required).
        code - The authorization code provided to the application via the call to the authentication/authorization API. (Required).
        specifiedOptions - Optional parameters. (Optional).
        callback - Used to capture the response. (Required).
        Throws:
        OIDCException
        DiscoveryResponseExpiredException - Thrown if the discovery response has expired.

      • parseIDToken

        public void parseIDToken(DiscoveryResponse discoveryResult,
                java.lang.String id_tokenStr,
                TokenOptions options,
                IParseIDTokenCallback callback)
                  throws OIDCException,
                         DiscoveryResponseExpiredException
        See IOIDC.parseIDToken(DiscoveryResponse, String, TokenOptions, IParseIDTokenCallback).
        Specified by:
        parseIDToken in interface IOIDC
        Parameters:
        discoveryResult - Result from discovery which contains the endpoints and application credentials. (Required).
        id_tokenStr - The id_token returned from a request to obtain a token from the authentication/authorization server. (Required).
        options - Optional parameters. (Optional).
        callback - Used to capture the response.
        Throws:
        OIDCException
        DiscoveryResponseExpiredException - Thrown if the discovery response has expired.

      • buildHttpPostForAccessToken

        private org.apache.http.client.methods.HttpPost buildHttpPostForAccessToken(java.net.URI uri,
                                                                  java.lang.String redirectURL,
                                                                  java.lang.String code)
                                                                     throws java.net.URISyntaxException,
                                                                            java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Build a HttpPost for the requestToken call.
        Parameters:
        uri - The URI of the token service.
        redirectURL - Redirect URL required by the token service.
        code - The code obtained from the authorization service.
        Returns:
        A HttpPost.
        Throws:
        java.net.URISyntaxException
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
